Text: Razumnik Vasilyevich Ivanov-Razumnik (real surname - Ivanov; Разумник Васильевич Иванов-Разумник; December 24 1878, Tiflis, Georgia, then Russian Empire, - July 9, 1946, Munich, Germany was a Soviet Russian writer, philosopher and literary critic, best known for his book "History of Russian Social Thought" (1907, in two volumes) and the series of essays on post-Revolution literary life in the Soviet Russia.
